name: The Ascender
description:
Summary

You're CBX_463. You're one of Mekanitek's latest prototype. You were made to be able to clean toxic residue from nuclear research facilities. However, something unusual happened. You are the only prototype that can act on it's own. It's your time now to discover where you are and get out from that test facility.

Gameplay
  • Use physics to solve puzzles
  • Absorb the  objects around you to gather energy
  • Use energy to solve complex puzzles be careful how you manage your energy. Once you're out of it, you're dead
